TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants PERSON and PERSON are NORP nationals who were born in DATE and DATE respectively and live in LOC . They are represented before the ORG by Mr PERSON , a lawyer practising in ORG .

CARDINAL . On an unspecified date ORG expropriated several plots of land , namely parcels nos . CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , DATE , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL , CARDINAL and CARDINAL , belonging to the applicants in the LOC village of GPE , in ORG , for the construction of FAC .

CARDINAL . In DATE , the applicants commenced proceedings before ORG for additional compensation for their respective plots . Following the applicants’ requests , ORG of First Instance awarded them additional compensation plus interest at the statutory rate . However , no interest was awarded for parcels nos . CARDINAL and CARDINAL . ORG appealed and ORG upheld the judgments of the first instance court .
